Each Dispo Item record will have a Pending Status. This will be used by T24 to determine which items are to be re-routed back to the officer that last had the item during the end of day process. If an item is held overnight, without this flag being set, the item must be brought into the system manually and would then take the default officer as specified in the parameters, account, etc.

td.p: When the item is brought back into the system manually, the Dispo Item will NOT be reset.
When the item is brought back into the system manually, the Dispo Item IS reset to the first Dispo Officer as per parameters, account, etc.
